name: Sudoku — Daily Brain Training
description:
Want to keep your mind in tonus or relax — sudoku classic game is the perfect choice!

Sudoku on mobile is excellent alternative to pen and paper version. Play in any place and any time. Four difficulty levels, flexible game space tuning, notes and hints will make the game pleasant and comfortable.

FEATURES:
— 4 difficulty levels;
— Perfect dark theme;
— Change board and number color;
— Change font size and style;
— Hide status bar;
— Hide timer;
— Hide used numbers;
— Mistakes limit on/off;
— Hints on/off;
— Daily reminder;
— And more...

If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team. Good game!
